messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE:  Pagan/Unitarian
messages.msgSnippet: My 11yo dd was looking at info about the US presidents in the Encyclopedia today and noticed that both John Adams and Thomas Jefferson were Unitarians. Also, a
messages.messageBody:
My 11yo dd was looking at info about the US presidents in the Encyclopedia
today and noticed that both John Adams and Thomas Jefferson were Unitarians.
Also, a lot of the abolitionists and 18th century feminists were of that
faith.-A-

http://www.uua.org/

Affirming t…</A>

When questions are about the individuals here and what they do and believe,
that can't be found anywhere else in the world, but when it's a matter of
definition or intro, sometimes www.google.com is the best source!
